nodes.text: Tripp's Rodian Hunter Outpost, also called Tripp's Base, was a space station established by the Rodian hunter Tripp Rar in the Kashyyyk system at the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was used to support Rar's hunting operations on the planet Kashyyyk.

Rar established this massive space station in the Kashyyyk system without explicit permission from the Empire. The traffic to and from this station was therefore under constant scrutinity and was often inspected for contraband.
